name: Vasilisas Torment
description:
Incredibly hardcore side-scrolling 2d platformer with an interesting storyline. Once Vasilisa was cursed by dark forces. They turned her into a scarecrow. But all the knights were afraid to save Vasilisa's soul, they thought that they too would be cursed. Only Ivan the Fool decided to save her. Climb a pillar above the sky, bypassing incredibly difficult obstacles, and find the key that will save Vasilisa's soul.

Key features:
- Detailed pixel art that conveys a dark and mysterious environment
– An interesting plot based on Old Slavonic fairy tales and traditions
— Mind-blowing level design that will not leave you indifferent
not a single hardcore player.
